{{Wired embedded system |brand=Arris |model=CM820 |revision=A (B/C/S) |upc=726947110717 |asin=B008GG78FU |est_release_date=06/30/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=Comcast |type=cable modem |fcc_id= |pwr_v=115-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=DNCE2500 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:1D:D2, E8:3E:FC }} {{TagLine|Ultra-High Speed Cable Modem}} :[http://arris.force.com/consumers/articles/General_FAQs/CM820A-NA-DOCSIS-3-0-Overview Support page]
*DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 (8-downstream, 4-upstream)<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
===Variants=== *CM820A - DOCSIS 3.0 ([[Comcast]]) *CM820B / CM820S - EuroDOCSIS 3.0 / DOCSIS 3.0 *CM820C - DOCSIS 3.0 (Japanese) There would appear to be multiple revisions of this device. :Some seem have a polarized power connector (C7P), :others have a non-polarized Fig-8 connector (C7).
===Likely compatible services=== *'''{{Approved by service|Comcast}}''' ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=322 ''Comcast'' device database entry])
===News=== *[http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=322 On '''Comcast'''] ([https://energy.cablelabs.com/comcast-sne/ SNE]) *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/ARRIS-CM820A-h3001 On '''DSLReports'''] (spec.) :CPU: [[Intel Puma]] DNCE2500 (DNCE25xx)
